{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|iterator}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
bool operator==( const std::istreambuf_iterator&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; lhs,
                 const std::istreambuf_iterator&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|until=c++20|1=
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
bool operator!=( const std::istreambuf_iterator&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; lhs,
                 const std::istreambuf_iterator&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++20|1=
friend bool operator==( const istreambuf_iterator&amp; lhs,
                        std::default_sentinel_t );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether both {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are valid, or both are invalid, regardless of the stream buffer objects they use.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|lhs.equal(rhs)}}.

@2@ Equivalent to {{c|!lhs.equal(rhs)}}.

@3@ Checks whether {{c|lhs}} is invalid. Equivalent to {{c|lhs.equal(istreambuf_iterator{})}}.&lt;br&gt;{{cpp/hidden friend|std::istreambuf_iterator&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;}}

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|stream buffer iterators to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ The result of {{c|lhs.equal(rhs)}}.

@2@ The result of {{c|!lhs.equal(rhs)}}.

@3@ The result of {{c|lhs.equal(istreambuf_iterator{})}}.
